sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import errorImg from '../../img/error.png' // Tooltip library import ReactTooltip from "react-tooltip"; import { BsFillQuestionCircleFill } from "react-icons/bs"; // Loading spinner library import HashLoader from "react-spinners/HashLoader"; import { css } from "@emotion/react"; import shiftingImg from '../../img/shifting.png' import splitImg from '../../img/split.png' // library for scrolling animation import { Animator, ScrollContainer, ScrollPage, batch, Fade, FadeIn, Move, MoveIn, MoveOut, Sticky, StickyIn, ZoomIn } from "react-scroll-motion"; import './Shifting.css' const Shifting = () => { const [display, setDisplay] = useState(""); const [resultData, setResultData] = useState(undefined); const [loadingResult, setLoadingResult] = useState(false); const [loadColor, setLoadColor] = useState("#8EB93B"); const FadeUp = batch(Fade(), Move(), Sticky()); const override = css` display: block; margin: 0 auto; border-color: red; `; // Onclick function when user submit the form const getResult = () => { // Change the content status to loading setLoadingResult(true); // fetch the data using "Post" and the form, store it fetch("/shift_predictions", { method: "POST", body: new FormData(document.getElementById("shifting_form")), }).then( res => res.json() ).then(data => { setResultData(data) setLoadingResult(false); setDisplay("result"); }) } useEffect(() => { setDisplay(""); }, []) // Disable the form from posting when hit "submit" const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() } // Display content based on the status let content = null; if (loadingResult == true) { content =

Trying to find the greenest start time

This might take a few seconds, a watched pot never boils!

} else if (display == "result"){ // Variable to store the result content let result = null; // Create a function to check if the prediction is accepted let acceptButtonDisplay =
if (resultData != null) { // Error Page if (resultData.type == "error") { const errorMsg = resultData.errorMessage const errorCode = resultData.errorCode result =

Oops, something went wrong - {errorCode}

Please {errorMsg}

// Page with warning message } else if (resultData.type == "load_shift_eval_2.html") { const warningMsg = resultData.warningMessage let returnData = resultData.returnData result =

{warningMsg}

Geo-Time Shifting Prediction Results

Suggested Azure Region

{returnData.min_moer_region}


Supporting Balancing Authority

{returnData.shiftBA}


Starting Emissions: Reduced by {returnData.shift_perc}% if run workload shifted out of {returnData.inputRegion}

{acceptButtonDisplay}

// Geotime page } else if (resultData.type == "load_shift_eval_geotime.html") { let returnData = resultData.returnData result =

Geo-Time Shifting Prediction Results


Current Data Region

{returnData.current_region}


Recommended Green Start Time

{returnData.greenest_starttime} UTC


New Data Region

{returnData.greenest_region}


Supporting Balancing Authority

{returnData.greenest_region_BA}


Total Run Emissions: Reduced by {returnData.percentage_decrease}% by Time Shifting with a window size of {returnData.window_size_in_minutes} minutes.

{acceptButtonDisplay}

// Geographic shifting prediction } else if (resultData.type == "load_shift_geo_eval.html") { let returnData = resultData.returnData result =

Geographic Shifting Prediction Results


Suggested Azure Region

{returnData.shiftAZ}


Supporting Balancing Authority

{returnData.shiftBA}


Starting Emissions: Reduced by {returnData.shift_perc}% if switched from {returnData.inputRegion} with a window size of {returnData.window_size_in_minutes} minutes.

{acceptButtonDisplay}

// Time shifting prediction } else if (resultData.type == "load_shift_eval.html") { let returnData = resultData.returnData result =

Time Shifting Prediction Results


Recommended Green Start Time

{returnData.shiftTime} UTC on {returnData.shiftDate}


Azure Region

{returnData.shift_choice}


Supporting Balancing Authority

{returnData.shiftBA}


Run Emissions: Reduced by {returnData.shift_perc}% by Time Shifting with a window size of {returnData.window_size}

Time (HH:MM:SS) Until Greenest Start Time: {returnData.shift_delta}

{acceptButtonDisplay}

} else { result =

Sorry, we couldn't find a prediction based on your input

Please try again


} } content =
{result}
} else { content =
{/* Website title section */}

Carbon Aware Scheduling

Choose a Job Scope

{/* Step One */} Step One:   

Load Shifting Prediction Types:


Demand Shifting: Carbon aware workload shifting which finds the greenest start time across all data centers permitted in the search. This method provides the best carbon reduction results out of the three shifting types.


Geographic Shifting: Find a new data center for compute instances for cross region shifting to reduce the resource's carbon footprint. This shifting type assumes an immediate start time for the compute activity.


Time Shifting: Search for the greenest starting time in at a specified data center.



{/* Step Two */} Step Two:
or

{/* Step Three */} Step Three:   

Run Duration is the expected duration of the compute. Picking a window size will return the start-time with the lowest average emissions rate for the given window size. Without a window size selected, it will return the single time of minimum emissions instead.
     

{/* Step Four */} Step Four:   

GPU SKU is the desired SKU to be used for the compute. This limits regions in geographic shifting to data centers that can offer the selection.

Workspace Contains Protected Data   

Protected Data implies that the workspace contains data subject to international migration and privacy laws. Selecting this option limits any potenial workload shift to data centers that would be compliant and not violate laws.
} return(
{content}
); } export default Shifting;
